Summary: Red light moved with no sound, turned on and off, then disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside on my deck because my dog was barking even though that isn't unusual. Looked in the general direction of the Ocean. Thought what I was seeing was Mars because of the color then realized it was much too red. It moved laterally. Then the light went off. The light reappeared for a few seconds and then disappeared completely. All of this happened in less than five minutes. There was no noise. There are no airports here except a landing strip which is rarely used at night. The night was clear and cloudless. My first thoughts were that it was a UFO. The island where I live is surrounded by water, which may or may not be related, but there have been numerous sightings. I have seen one very close up and have had a few other sightings in the distance. Is it possible to find out if anyone else also saw unusual lights in the sky last night? Thanks, Beverly
